meanings: (잔치·시위 등을) (시위 등을) stage; (잔치 등을) throw, give

examples.korean: Nurses often have to contend with violent or drunken patients. 발음듣기 간호사들은 폭력적이거나 술 취한 환자들과도 자주 씨름을 벌여야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Nurses often have to contend with violent or drunken patients. 발음

examples.korean: The new service to Santa Fe is in direct competition with Tiptor Airlines for the Santa Fe market. 발음듣기 산타페까지의 새로운 운항으로 산타페 시장을 놓고 팁터 항공사와 직접적인 경쟁을 벌여야 합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new service to Santa Fe is in direct competition with Tiptor Airlines for the Santa Fe market. 발음

examples.korean: It is (high) time that we should start a campaign for the environment. 발음듣기 이제는 우리가 환경 운동을 벌여야 할 때입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is (high) time that we should start a campaign for the environment. 발음

examples.korean: It is time for us to initiate a campaign for the environment. 발음듣기 이제는 우리가 환경 운동을 벌여야 할 때입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is time for us to initiate a campaign for the environment. 발음

examples.korean: Harder to reconcile, however, are the starkly different views on why the nation should be doing this job at this very moment. 발음듣기 하지만 이해하기 어려운 것은 왜 한국이 바로 이 시점에 이런 일을 벌여야 하느냐에 대한 전혀 다른 견해이다. Neungyule
examples.english: Harder to reconcile, however, are the starkly different views on why the nation should be doing this job at this very moment. 발음
